definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Could you show me how to use my key card?
sentences.chinese: 请问你知道这张房卡该怎么用吗？

sentences.english: Here is your room card and breakfast coupon.
sentences.chinese: 这是您的房卡和早餐券。

sentences.english: Yes , of course . May I have your room card , please?
sentences.chinese: 当然可以，我能看一下您的房卡吗？

sentences.english: Please show me your room card.
Ok, May I have a look at your room card?
sentences.chinese: 能不克不及让我看下您的房卡？

sentences.english: Sorry, may I have you room key and room card?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，您能告诉我您的房间号并出示您的房卡吗？

sentences.english: Could you show me how to use my key card please?
sentences.chinese: 请问你能告诉我这张房卡怎么用吗？

sentences.english: Yes, I live in 1308, and here's my room card.
sentences.chinese: 对，我住在1308房，噢，这是我的房卡。

sentences.english: Please remember to take the key and room card when you use the safe.
sentences.chinese: 您下次来取物品时，请别忘了带钥匙和房卡。

sentences.english: This is your room card and room key?
sentences.chinese: 那是您的房卡战房间钥匙。

sentences.english: May I have your room card and room key?
sentences.chinese: 请出示您的房卡和钥匙。

sentences.english: Then may I see your hotel passport, and would you sign here, please?
sentences.chinese: 请让我看看您的房卡并在这里签名，好吗？

sentences.english: Here is your room key and the breakfast coupon.
sentences.chinese: 这是您的房卡和早餐券。

sentences.english: And by the way， could I have a look at your room card？
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一句，我可以看一下您的房卡吗？

sentences.english: Here is your room key and the breakfastcoupon. Would you please sign here?
sentences.chinese: 这是您的房卡和早餐券。请您在这里签个名好吗？

sentences.english: Thank you, and here's your recipt, room key. Enjoy your stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，这是您的押金单和房卡，祝您住得愉快。

definition: to take a hotel room/to rent a room
stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
to check out of a hotel room
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
(Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
